## `safira-cli spec publish`

Pulbish a spec file

```
USAGE
  $ safira-cli spec publish [-s <value>]

FLAGS
  -s, --select-spec=<value>  Select the spec to publish.

DESCRIPTION
  Pulbish a spec file

EXAMPLES
  $ safira-cli spec publish
```
